【POWERFUL MAGNET】Maximum suction weight up to 5lb, easily find and grab lost items in hard to reach areas, helpful when working in automobiles, construction, HVAC and other home projects. Note: the amount of suction is related to the contact area and location of the absorbent article
【TELESCOPING HANDLE】Made from aluminum alloy, making tools shockproof. Handles extend up to 34.65inch, help to grab lost items in far to reach areas. Anti-slip, oil-resistant plastic coating and ergonomic design, provides comfortable grip and more effortless use.
【SUPER BRIGHT FLASHLIGHT】3 super bright LED bulbs, Magnet head and base, 360°swivel neck, 2.5lb maximum suction weight with extended 2″ stainless steel pocket clip help to illuminate and grab tools in dark narrow places.
【360° ROTATION ROUND & SQUARE INSPECTION MIRRORS】Made from premium-quality glass for perfect reflection, all-angled ball joint holds mirrors for 360 degree free viewing and keeps it from swinging, square mirror has LED lights facilitate inspection of dark areas.
【COMPACT PORTABLE TOOL BAG】Small size carries wealth of tools, easy to carry. Made of Oxford cloth, resist to wear and tear. Extended hand strap design, easy to carry and store. Additional pocket with hook and loop fasteners on the bag for gathering tools conveniently. Separate elastic band inside, help to organize.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $34.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:50:31 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Meet Ransom Notes, the creative party game for making hilariously terrible sentences.

Ransom Notes is a laugh-out-loud, always fresh game where you compete against your friends to answer outlandish prompts from a limited pool of word magnets.

Designed for 3-6 players, Ransom Notes is perfect for game nights group that want a game as absurd as it is clever.

Hilariously unique every time.

With 250 absurd prompt cards and a different pool of word magnets every time, players end up creating an infinite variety of terribly awesome sentences.

Learn to play in one minute.

Just take a few handfuls of word magnets, flip over a prompt card, and start playing — no long instructions to explain.

A creative twist on party games.

Ransom notes isn’t just a play a card, judge picks the winner party game — players are constantly engaged in creative, out-of-the-box thinking that will have you crying from laughing.

Always unique and hilarious!

Ransom Notes is perfect for game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

Make it your own.

Ransom Notes is perfect for adult game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game is rated 17+ for some adult content, but can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

As clean or dirty as the people playing. Mostly.

Ransom Notes is perfect for adult game nights, quirky holiday gifts, and funny birthday presents for clever people. The game is rated 17+ for some adult content, but can be easily made family friendly by removing some of the prompt cards.

Turn your game nights into hours of always fresh, tears-streaming-down-your-face hilarity with the word magnet party game that will have your friends creating amazingly terrible sentences you’ll never forget.

Meet Ransom Notes, the game of hilariously terrible sentences! Players use word magnets to respond to outlandish prompts like “Tell someone you’ve clogged their toilet at a party” with just their limited pool of words
With 250 absurd prompt cards and a new pool of words every time, this party game has infinite hilarious combinations and feels fresh every time you play
Learn to play in under one minute, and even the shyest players will be creating laugh-out-loud word magnet responses right away
For 3-6 players, but equally hilarious when larger groups team up together. 30-90 min play time
A funny party game gift for adult game night, family game nights, bachelorette parties
Includes: 840 high quality word magnets, 6 metal submission cards, 250 prompt cards, and instructions

Product Description

Remember those slap bracelets from middle school? Like you, they’re all grown up now, with grownup responsibilities like keeping all your nuts, bolts, and screws handy while you clear that weekend chore list.
SUPER STRONG – Fifteen powerful magnets in the band with breathable mesh inside to hold everything you need to help put the Handy in Handyman. Chores around the house are a lot more fun with a tool belt on your wrist!
MULTIPURPOSE – Whether Grandpa is a woodworking wizard or the world’s greatest hair stylist, the MagSnap makes a great birthday or Fathers Day present. Trust us, he’ll feel super cool holding nails and sewing pins on his new magnetic bracelet.
GREAT GIFT – Whether it’s a stocking stuffer or just looking to give a cool gadget gift. This is the perfect gift to give a husband, dad, father-in-law, DIYer, handyman, electrician, mechanic, or just that person who has everything.
INCLUDES – (1) MagSnap magnetic wrist band. One size fits most. Great gift for dads who have everything. Wrap-It Storage is a family business based in St. Paul, MN. PATENT PENDING.

From the brand

Rookie Driver Car Magnets

Student Driver Car Magnet

We are committed to researching magnetic student driving signs, decals and stickers. Our mission is to ensure that every driver has a more enjoyable and comfortable driving experience, to allow other drivers to tolerate you with more space and respect, to reduce the nervousness of new drivers while preventing the possibility of accidents.

Christmas Gifts

A great gift for your family, friends, colleagues and neighbours in the run up to Christmas!

➽STRONGEST MAGNETS: The student driver car magnet is made of 0.7mm thick strong magnet. Compared with other magnets, it is thicker, stronger, more durable and be patient student driver magnet can be more firmly attached to the surface of the car, we have tested for a long time at high speed, heavy rain and snow and never fall off. Tip: Magnets can only be attached to metal surfaces, not to plastic or aluminum parts.
➽HIGHLY REFLECTIVITY: New driver magnet for car is made of high quality waterproof and heat resistant materials through strong magnetic and highly reflective materials to maximize the amount of light reflected from the sign, attracting people’s attention and ensuring that the rookie driver car magnet is clearly visible even at night, in fog and rain, and other drivers can notice you from the side and back of the car. An excellent tool for teens with no driving experience.
➽Unique design: New driver sticker signs will be displayed humorously and can make others aware that you are learning to drive, then they will be tolerant of providing you with more space and respect and reduce the possibility of annoying honking while controlling the speed of their car to prevent an accident. Student driver magnet also can reduce the level of nervousness teen driver feel when driving.
➽Removable and Reusable: Student driver signs for car removable, easily removable or transferable thanks to the magnetized backing. All driver magnets can be removed and reattached anytime. You can easily transfer it to another car when it is needed. Perfect as a gift for your family, colleagues, friends during various holidays, parties, birthdays
➽100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We are dedicated to providing the best quality new driver sticker for car to our customers. If you are in any way dissatisfied with our please be patient student driver magnet, please contact us and we will do our best to provide you a satisfactory reply.
